text: The actress who is known more for staggering around town than actually appearing on the big screen, finally checked into rehab. In a statement from her people, it was confirmed, "Tara Reid has checked herself into Promises Treatment Center. '' Promises is the home away from home for many stars including Britney Spears, Lindsay Lohan and Ben Affleck. Tara is known for her roles in American Pie and Van Wilder. She also starred in the ill-fated party show, Taradise, on the E! network which premiered in September 2005 was canceled the following month
title: Tara Reid has finally looked in a mirror and got a glimpse of what was starting back.
